thread.title_full: Ideal for business trip nearby congres centre. Walking distance - Review of Hotel Oceania Paris Porte de Versailles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Z2956RA
title: Ideal for business trip nearby congres centre. Walking distance
text:
Hotel okay. Checking out takes time. Take that into account if you are in a hurry. Can be also be busy if there is a congres.
Hotel is in walking distance from congres centre. Metro to gare du Nord easy if you travel light, otherwise it is a huge challenge to get to the Gates at the metro stations.
